permissions.name: Access Custom Mobile Apps
permissions.description: Allow user to run custom mobile apps.

permissions.name: API Enabled
permissions.description: Access any Salesforce.com API.

permissions.name: Api Only User
permissions.description: Access Salesforce.com only through a Salesforce.com API.

permissions.name: Assign Topics
permissions.description: Assign existing topics to feed items. Remove topics from feed items.

permissions.name: Author Apex
permissions.description: Create Apex classes and triggers.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Bulk API Hard Delete
permissions.description: Delete records in the Bulk API without storing them in the Recycle Bin.

permissions.name: Chatter Internal User
permissions.description: Use all Chatter features.

permissions.name: Configure Custom Recommendations
permissions.description: Add custom recommendations in the feed, motivating users to get engaged and take action.

permissions.name: Connect Organization to Environment Hub
permissions.description: Allows a user to connect this organization to an Environment Hub.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Create and Customize Dashboards
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete dashboards in personal folders.

permissions.name: Create and Customize List Views
permissions.description: Create list views; modify and delete own list views.

permissions.name: Create and Customize Reports
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete reports in personal folders.

permissions.name: Create and Own New Chatter Groups
permissions.description: Create and own new Chatter groups.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Creating new chatter groups requires giving users the ??? permission set.

permissions.name: Create and Set Up Communities
permissions.description: Create communities, manage community-wide settings, membership, login and registration, branding, and associated Site.com site.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Create and Share Content Deliveries for Salesforce Files
permissions.description: Share a Chatter file with anyone by creating a file link and sending it via email or IM.

permissions.name: Create and Upload Change Sets
permissions.description: Create, edit, and upload outbound change sets.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Create AppExchange Packages
permissions.description: Create packages that can be distributed through AppExchange.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Create custom Badge Definitions
permissions.description: Create custom badge definitions.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Create Dashboard Folders
permissions.description: Create dashboard folders and manage these folders if sharing rights allow.
permissions.guidanceNotes: If in apps report strategy

permissions.name: Create Report Folders
permissions.description: Create report folders and manage these folders if sharing rights allow.
permissions.guidanceNotes: If in apps report strategy

permissions.name: Create Topics
permissions.description: Create new topics by assigning them to feed items.

permissions.name: Customize Application
permissions.description: Customize the organization using App Setup menu options.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Delete Topics
permissions.description: Delete topics and remove all corresponding topic assignments from feed items.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Deploy Change Sets
permissions.description: Deploy inbound change sets.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Download AppExchange Packages
permissions.description: Install or uninstall AppExchange packages as system administrators.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any project user

permissions.name: Drag-and-Drop Dashboard Builder
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete dashboards through the drag-and-drop dashboard builder interface.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should be considered carefully as part of an applications reporting strategy

permissions.name: Edit Events
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete events.

permissions.name: Edit HTML Templates
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete HTML email templates.

permissions.name: Edit My Dashboards
permissions.description: Edit, move, save, and delete user's own dashboards in shared folders.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should be considered carefully as part of an applications reporting strategy

permissions.name: Edit My Own Posts
permissions.description: Allow users to edit their own feed items.

permissions.name: Edit My Reports
permissions.description: Edit, move, save, and delete user's own reports in shared folders.
permissions.guidanceNotes: If in apps report strategy

permissions.name: Edit Posts on Records I Own
permissions.description: Allow users to edit feed items they manage.

permissions.name: Edit Read Only Fields
permissions.description: Edit fields that are read only due to page layouts or field-level security.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Overides a level of security, and will be applicable to all other applications a user has access to.

permissions.name: Edit Tasks
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete tasks.

permissions.name: Edit Topics
permissions.description: Edit topic names and descriptions.

permissions.name: Enable Work.com
permissions.description: Allow Work.com only users to access Work.com functionality.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Enable Work.com Calibration
permissions.description: Allow Work.com users to access Work.com Calibration functionality.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Export Reports
permissions.description: Use Export Details and Printable View to export reports.

permissions.name: Import Custom Objects
permissions.description: Allows non-admin users to import Custom Objects using Data Import Wizard.

permissions.name: Insert System Field Values for Chatter Feeds
permissions.description: Set the author or creation date for a Chatter post or comment.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Invite Customers To Chatter
permissions.description: Invite Customers To Chatter
permissions.guidanceNotes: Not in line with Lilly Policy

permissions.name: Lightning Experience User
permissions.description: Access the Salesforce Lightning Experience. Users with this permission can individually enable or disable this user interface.

permissions.name: Manage All Private Reports and Dashboards
permissions.description: Allows full access to reports and dashboards in all other users' private folders (API only).
permissions.guidanceNotes: Snapshots are limited. Engage Cirrus if your application is likely to use them

permissions.name: Manage Auth. Providers
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Billing
permissions.description: Purchade additional licenses and features

permissions.name: Manage Chatter Messages
permissions.description: Access all users' messages sent in Chatter.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Communities
permissions.description: Access Community Management to view community dashboards and set up Reputation point system and levels.

permissions.name: Manage Connected Apps
permissions.description: Manage, create, edit, and delete connected applications.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Custom Permissions
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete custom permissions

permissions.name: Manage Custom Report Types
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete custom report types.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Report Types can be managed through service requests

permissions.name: Manage Dashboards in Public Folders
permissions.description: Create, edit, delete dashboards, and manage their sharing in all public folders.
permissions.guidanceNotes: The GSO has granular folder sharing, and as such this permission should not be required for end users. Instead make users "Editors" or "Managers" of application specifc folders. This means that users will only see folders that are relevent to them.

permissions.name: Manage Data Categories
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete data categories.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Data Integrations
permissions.description: Monitor or abort Bulk API jobs.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Dynamic Dashboards
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete dynamic dashboards.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Dynamic Dashboard are extermely limited in the GSO. If your application wants to utilise dynamic dashboards then please contact the Cirrus team to discuss this in advance.

permissions.name: Manage Email Client Configurations
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete Outlook configurations for Salesforce for Outlook.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Force.com Flow
permissions.description: Create and edit Force.com Flows.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Letterheads
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete letterheads for HTML emails.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Mobile Configurations
permissions.description: Access Salesforce Classic features.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Package Licenses
permissions.description: Manage package licenses in subscriber organizations.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Promoted Search Terms
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete promoted search terms

permissions.name: Manage Public Documents
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete folders for public documents.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Public List Views
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete public list views.

permissions.name: Manage Public Templates
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete text emails, mail merge templates, and folders for public email templates.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Reporting Snapshots
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete reporting snapshots

permissions.name: Manage Reports in Public Folders
permissions.description: Create, edit, delete reports, and manage their sharing in all public folders.

permissions.name: Manage Sharing Calculation Deferral
permissions.description: Suspend and resume sharing calculation.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Synonyms
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete synonym groups.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Translation
permissions.description: Manage translated labels in the Translation Workbench.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Manage Two-Factor Authentication
permissions.description: Manage the time-based token secret for two-factor authentication

permissions.name: Manage Unlisted Groups
permissions.description: View and moderate unlisted Chatter groups

permissions.name: Mass Edits from Lists
permissions.description: Edit multiple records simultaneously from a list with inline editing.

permissions.name: Mass Email
permissions.description: Send mass emails to contacts and leads.
permissions.guidanceNotes: If this is required please contact Cirrus in advance

permissions.name: Merge Topics
permissions.description: Merge one or more topics

permissions.name: Moderate Chatter
permissions.description: Deactivate Chatter Free users, assign moderator privileges to Chatter Free users, and remove posts.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Moderate Communities Feeds
permissions.description: Moderate Chatter Feeds in communities

permissions.name: Moderate Communities Files
permissions.description: Moderate Chatter Files in communities

permissions.name: Modify All Data
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete all organization data, regardless of sharing settings.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Applicable across all applications on the platform. Should never be given out as part of an application permission set

permissions.name: Password Never Expires
permissions.description: Prevent the user's password from expiring.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be used for any application permission set. Talk to Cirrus if you have an integration user.

permissions.name: Report Builder
permissions.description: Create, edit, and delete reports through the drag and drop report builder interface.

permissions.name: Run Flows
permissions.description: Run flows.

permissions.name: Run Reports
permissions.description: Run reports and dashboards.

permissions.name: Schedule Dashboards
permissions.description: Schedule when dashboards refresh, and send email notifications that include refreshed dashboards in HTML format.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Not available

permissions.name: Schedule Reports
permissions.description: Run reports in the background, and export results as a CSV or Excel file on completion.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Not available

permissions.name: Select Files from Salesforce
permissions.description: Selecting a Salesforce file is an option when attaching a file.

permissions.name: Send Outbound Messages
permissions.description: Send outbound messages to an external Web service API.

permissions.name: Show Custom Sidebar On All Pages
permissions.description: Display a custom sidebar on all pages in Salesforce.com

permissions.name: Sync Files
permissions.description: Allows users to sync selected files between Chatter and their devices.

permissions.name: Transfer Record
permissions.description: Change the owner of most records.

permissions.name: Two-Factor Authentication for API Logins
permissions.description: Require users to enter a time-based token instead of the emailed security token in the API.

permissions.name: Two-Factor Authentication for User Interface Logins
permissions.description: Require users to enter a time-based token during login.

permissions.name: Upload AppExchange Packages
permissions.description: Upload packages to AppExchange for distribution.

permissions.name: Use Identity Connect
permissions.description: Gives the user access to the Identity Connect product which provides Active Directory integration.

permissions.name: Use Identity Features
permissions.description: Gives the user access to Identity features such as App Launcher.

permissions.name: View All Data
permissions.description: View all organizational data, regardless of sharing settings.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should never be given out - will grant access to all data on the platform with the exception of encrypted data

permissions.name: View Dashboards in Public Folders
permissions.description: View and access dashboards in public folders, which does not include others personal folders.
permissions.guidanceNotes: This will grant visibility of more dashboard than the user needs. For usability and security do not assign this to ordinary users

permissions.name: View Data Categories
permissions.description: View the Data Categories page.

permissions.name: View Encrypted Data
permissions.description: View the value of encrypted fields in plain text.

permissions.name: View Event Log Files
permissions.description: Get CSV event log files via the API

permissions.name: View Global Header
permissions.description: View the global header to switch between apps and communities and access personal setup and customization options

permissions.name: View Help Link
permissions.description: Allow user to view help link.

permissions.name: View My Team's Dashboards
permissions.description: View dashboards owned by people under them in the role hierarchy.
permissions.guidanceNotes: The GSO does not have a role hierachy, making this permission defunct for applications in the GSO.

permissions.name: View Reports in Public Folders
permissions.description: View and access reports in public folders, which does not include others personal folders.
permissions.guidanceNotes: This will grant visibility of more dashboard than the user needs. For usability and security do not assign this to ordinary users

permissions.name: View Setup and Configuration
permissions.description: View the App Setup and Administrative Settings pages.

permissions.name: Weekly Data Export
permissions.description: Run the weekly data export service.
permissions.guidanceNotes: Should not be relevent for any appliction user

permissions.name: Allow sending of List Emails
permissions.description: Allow users to create, edit and send List Emails.

permissions.name: Allow WebLink access via the Tooling API
permissions.description: Allow users to access WebLinks via the Tooling API

permissions.name: Create and Update Second-Generation Packages
permissions.description: Create and update these packages using the command-line interface.

permissions.name: Create Content Deliveries
permissions.description: Create content delivery links to share files that aren't managed by a library. To let a user create content deliveries for files in a library, enable Deliver Content for that user in the library.

permissions.name: Create Public Links
permissions.description: Let users create links to share files externally. Unlike content deliveries, public links can't be password protected. To let a user create links to files in a library, enable Deliver Content for that user in the library.

permissions.name: Pin Posts in Feeds
permissions.description: Assign permission to pin a post in this org and your communities.

permissions.name: Verify Answers to Chatter Questions
permissions.description: Mark answers to Chatter questions as verified.

permissions.name: View Community 360
permissions.description: Access and gauge a customer's use of a community. Make sure this type of data gathering complies with your company privacy policies.
